User Guide: Date when the unit became active in the facility.
Date when the unit ceased operation in the facility.
ETL Conventions: *null* if the unit is still active

User Guide: Count of *dwh_document* attached to this unit
Count of *dwh_patient_mvt* attached to this unit
Count of *dwh_patient* attached to this unit

ETL Conventions: Defined at the start of the pipeline as `datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d%H%M%S")`
